name: Disco Match
description:
Welcome to Disco Match! Solve match-3 puzzles and decorate areas in a trendy disco style.

Join Brandon and Wendy on their journey to bring people together with disco! Beat match-3 levels, unlock unique areas and decorate them in a colorful disco style. What are you waiting for? Jump on the dance floor and join the disco fun!

Game features:
* Unique match-3 gameplay and fun levels for both masters and new match-3 players!
* Collect valuable coins and special treasures in bonus levels!
* Unlock powerful boosters and blast your way through levels!
* Watch out for various obstacles such as roller skates, cocktail glasses, soda cans, juke boxes, cuckoo clocks and even moving liquid metal!
* Explore disco clubs, roller rinks, bowling alleys and many more exciting areas in the Disco zone.

Disco Match is FREE TO PLAY, with optional in-game items for purchase.

--------------------

Want to be a part of our community? You can find us on:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/discomatch/

Do you need help? Contact our support team directly from the Disco Match app.
